com.worizon.jsonrpc

Class JsonRpc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.worizon.jsonrpc.JsonRpc
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonRpcRequest, JsonRpcResponse

    public abstract class JsonRpc
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for JsonRpcRequest and JsonRpcResponse classes. Common fields for both request and response objects are defined here as well as static helpers methods to serialize and deserialize.
    Author:
    Enric Cecilla
